Promoted.title: Online.io - Earn Tokens to Browse The Internet
Promoted.body:
Online.io is implementing a decentralized ecosystem which combines all necessary features for a faster, safer, and more private Internet browsing. Moreover, through the Online.io platform developed by using the most advanced Blockchain technology, both internet end users and website operators will benefit alike.

The Online (OIO) token is a unique digital asset that will unleash the Internet from ads, malware and tracking software, leading to a more enjoyable and secure browsing experience, with sizeable benefits for both web operators and end users.

Data.title: Dismissing Bitcoin is ‘Too Arrogant,’ Says Goldman Sachs’ CEO
Data.body: While Lloyd Blankfein doesn’t own any bitcoin himself — nor does his American multinational investment bank and financial services company — the CEO of Goldman Sachs still believes that critics shouldn’t dismiss the first and foremost cryptocurrency’s future. ‘Why couldn’t you have a consensus currency?’ While speaking at The Economic Club of New York, Blankfein was far from bearish. Data.title: Infected Android Emulator Reportedly Uses Victims’ CPU Resources to Mine Crypto
Data.body: The Andy OS Android Emulator is reportedly installing a GPU Miner Trojan on the computers of unsuspecting users. It appears that the Trojan file was authored by Andy OS, Inc. The company has not yet responded to queries and even kicked people out of their official Facebook group just for asking about what’s going on.
